member.name: T:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder
member.summary: Provides the ability to record user buffer from application.

member.returns: An IEnumerable of representing the supported file formats.

member.returns: An IEnumerable of representing the supported audio codecs.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.GetSupportedVideoCodecs
member.summary: Gets the video codecs that the current device supports.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.GetSupportedVideoResolutions
member.summary: Gets the video resolutions that the current device supports.

member.summary: Gets the current state of the stream recorder.

member.summary: Prepares the stream recorder with the specified options.
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.
contains a value which is not supported.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.Unprepare
member.summary: Unprepares the stream recorder.
member.remarks:
The recorder state must be state by , and .
The recorder state will be .
It has no effect if the recorder is already in the state.
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.Start
member.summary: Starts recording.
member.remarks:
The recorder state must be state by or state by .
It has no effect if the recorder is already in the state.
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.
The access of the resources can not be granted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.Pause
member.summary: Pauses recording.
member.remarks:
Recording can be resumed with .
The recorder state must be state by .
It has no effect if the recorder is already in the state.
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.Commit
member.summary: Stops recording and saves the result.
member.remarks:
The recorder state must be state by or state by .
The recorder state will be after commit.
http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage is needed if the save path are relevant to media storage. http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage is needed if the save path are relevant to external storage.
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.
The access to the resources can not be granted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels recording. The recording data is discarded and not written.
member.remarks: The recorder state must be state by or state by .
member.exception: The recorder is not in the valid state.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorder.PushBuffer(Tizen.Multimedia.MediaPacket)
member.summary: Pushes a packet as recording raw data.
member.param: An audio or video packet to record.
member.remarks: The recorder state must be state by .
member.exception:
The recorder is not in the valid state.
-or-
is an audio packet but audio recording is not enabled(See ).
-or-
is a video packet but video recording is not enabled(See ).
-or-
is a video packet but the does not match the video source format.
-or-
An internal error occurs.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderAudioOptions.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sampling rate of the audio stream in hertz.
member.remarks: If the value is zero, the sample rate will be decided based on input buffers.
member.value: The sample rate value for stream recorder. The default is zero.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderAudioOptions.BitRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the bit rate of the audio encoder in bits per second.
member.value: The bit rate value for audio stream recording. The default is 128000.
member.exception: is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderAudioOptions.Channels
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of audio channels.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderOptions.SavePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to record.
member.remarks: If the same file already exists in the file system, then old file will be overwritten.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderOptions.FileFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the file format for recording media stream.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderOptions.TimeLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the time limit of recording.
member.value: The maximum time of recording in seconds, or 0 for unlimited time.
member.remarks: After reaching the limitation, the data which is being recorded will be discarded and not written to the file.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.StreamRecorderOptions.SizeLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of a recording file.
member.value: The maximum size of a recording file in kilobytes, or 0 for unlimited size.
member.remarks: After reaching the limitation, the data which is being recorded will be discarded and not written to the file.
